Name: Duke Arthur Luvon
Details:
Born 2971, died 3010.

The former Duke of Donegal and late husband of Archon Katrina Steiner and father of Melissa Steiner, Arthur Luvon died of cancer in 3010. The duke was also a known enemy of Alessandro Steiner, the previous Archon, and a cousin of Morgan and Patrick Kell of the mercenary company Kell Hounds.
